sources.title: Fire Maidens of Outer Space (1956)
sources.description: "Fire Maidens of Outer Space" is a 1956 British science fiction film directed by Cy Roth. The story revolves around a group of astronauts who journey to the planet Krypton after receiving a distress signal from an earlier expedition. Upon arrival, they discover a civilization of beautiful women who are the last survivors of a once-thriving society. The women are led by a character named Mona , who reveals that they are threatened by a malevolent force known as Kronos . Although it received mixed to negative reviews, Fire Maidens of Outer Space has gained a cult following due to its kitschy elements, including awkward dialogues and costumes, which make it a fun watch for fans of vintage sci-fi.

metadata.Plot: After landing on the 13th moon of Jupiter, the men from Earth debark from their ship to find a forested area containing the last remnant of lost Atlantis: an old man named Prossus, a bevy of nubile young women eager for husbands, and -- The Creature. "The beast with the head of a fish," laments Prossus. "It must be destroyed -- yet it is indestructible!"
metadata.Actors: Anthony Dexter, Susan Shaw, Paul Carpenter
